languages.text: "Особый отряд — специализируется на выслеживании и захвате опасных преступников. Они расследовали предательство Эммерсона и вышли на логово еретиков, где меня держали".

"A special unit. Exaction squads are dispatched to track down and apprehend dangerous criminals. They were investigating Emmerson's betrayal, and it had led them to the heretics' hideout where I was being held prisoner."
languages.original_text: "Особый отряд — специализируется на выслеживании и захвате опасных преступников. Они расследовали предательство Эммерсона и вышли на логово еретиков, где меня держали".

traits.locale_text: "A special unit. Exaction squads are dispatched to track down and seize dangerous criminals. They were investigating Emmerson's betrayal, and it had led them to the heretics' hideout where I was being held prisoner."

"A special unit. Exaction squads are dispatched to track down and seize dangerous criminals. They were investigating Emmerson's betrayal, and it had led them to the heretics' hideout where I was being held prisoner."

"A special unit. Exaction squads are dispatched to track down and apprehend dangerous criminals. They were investigating Emmerson's betrayal, and it had led them to the heretics' hideout where I was being held prisoner."

"A special unit. Exaction squads are dispatched to track down and seize dangerous criminals. I was one of their targets — I imagine you can see why: I was the only survivor, and my close associate had turned out to be a traitor... A lot of questions there."

"A special unit. Exaction squads are dispatched to track down and apprehend dangerous criminals. They were investigating Emmerson's betrayal, and it had led them to the heretics' hideout where I was being held prisoner."

"A special unit. Exaction squads are dispatched to track down and apprehend dangerous criminals. They were investigating Emmerson's betrayal, and it had led them to the heretics' hideout where I was being held prisoner."

"A special unit. Exaction squads are dispatched to track down and apprehend dangerous criminals. They were investigating Emmerson's betrayal, and it had led them to the heretics' hideout where I was being held prisoner."

languages.text: 「特殊部隊です。エグザクション部隊は、危険な犯罪者を追跡し逮捕するために派遣されます。彼らはエマーソンの裏切りを調査していて、それが私が囚われていた異端者の隠れ家へと導いたのです」
languages.original_text: "A special unit. Exaction squads are dispatched to track down and apprehend dangerous criminals. They were investigating Emmerson's betrayal, and it had led them to the heretics' hideout where I was being held prisoner."

traits.locale_text: 「特殊部隊です。エグザクション部隊は、危険な犯罪者を追跡し逮捕するために派遣されます。彼らはエマーソンの裏切りを調査していて、それが私が囚われていた異端者の隠れ家へと導いたのです」

languages.text: "Eine Spezialeinheit. Vollstreckertrupps werden entsandt, um gefährliche Kriminelle aufzuspüren und zu ergreifen. Sie hat Emmersons Verrat untersucht und gelangte so zu dem Versteck der Ketzer, in dem ich gefangen gehalten wurde."
languages.original_text: "A special unit. Exaction squads are dispatched to track down and apprehend dangerous criminals. They were investigating Emmerson's betrayal, and it had led them to the heretics' hideout where I was being held prisoner."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Spezialeinheit. Vollstreckertrupps werden entsandt, um gefährliche Kriminelle aufzuspüren und zu ergreifen. Sie hat Emmersons Verrat untersucht und gelangte so zu dem Versteck der Ketzer, in dem ich gefangen gehalten wurde."

languages.text: « Il s'agit d'une unité spéciale. Les escouades d'exaction sont chargées de traquer et d'appréhender les criminels les plus dangereux. Elles enquêtaient sur la trahison d'Emmerson, ce qui les a menées jusqu'au repaire des hérétiques où j'étais retenu prisonnier. »
languages.original_text: "A special unit. Exaction squads are dispatched to track down and apprehend dangerous criminals. They were investigating Emmerson's betrayal, and it had led them to the heretics' hideout where I was being held prisoner."

traits.locale_text: « Il s'agit d'une unité spéciale. Les escouades d'exaction sont chargées de traquer et d'appréhender les criminels les plus dangereux. Elles enquêtaient sur la trahison d'Emmerson, ce qui les a menées jusqu'au repaire des hérétiques où j'étais retenu prisonnier. »

languages.text: «Una unidad especial. Las escuadras de exacción se envían para localizar y capturar criminales peligrosos. Investigaban la traición de Emmerson, y su rastro les condujo hasta el escondrijo de los herejes que me mantenían prisionero».
languages.original_text: "A special unit. Exaction squads are dispatched to track down and apprehend dangerous criminals. They were investigating Emmerson's betrayal, and it had led them to the heretics' hideout where I was being held prisoner."

traits.locale_text: «Una unidad especial. Las escuadras de exacción se envían para localizar y capturar criminales peligrosos. Investigaban la traición de Emmerson, y su rastro les condujo hasta el escondrijo de los herejes que me mantenían prisionero».

languages.text: “他们是特殊部队，负责追踪、抓捕危险的罪犯。他们当时在调查艾莫森的背叛行为，发现了那些异端分子的藏身之处，也找到了遭到囚禁的我。”
languages.original_text: "A special unit. Exaction squads are dispatched to track down and apprehend dangerous criminals. They were investigating Emmerson's betrayal, and it had led them to the heretics' hideout where I was being held prisoner."

traits.locale_text: “他们是特殊部队，负责追踪、抓捕危险的罪犯。他们当时在调查艾莫森的背叛行为，发现了那些异端分子的藏身之处，也找到了遭到囚禁的我。”

languages.text: "Özel bir birim. Zapt mangaları, tehlikeli suçluları takip edip tutuklamakla görevlendirilir. Emmerson'ın ihanetini araştırıyorlardı. Bu da onları esir tutulduğum kâfir sığınağına getirdi."
languages.original_text: "A special unit. Exaction squads are dispatched to track down and apprehend dangerous criminals. They were investigating Emmerson's betrayal, and it had led them to the heretics' hideout where I was being held prisoner."

traits.locale_text: "Özel bir birim. Zapt mangaları, tehlikeli suçluları takip edip tutuklamakla görevlendirilir. Emmerson'ın ihanetini araştırıyorlardı. Bu da onları esir tutulduğum kâfir sığınağına getirdi."
